医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
利用人工智能彻底改变蚊子监测，帮助非洲抗击疟疾南佛罗里达大学的研究人员正在利用人工智能彻底改变蚊子监测，以帮助非洲对抗疟疾。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240608/Using-AI-to-revolutionize-mosquito-surveillance-to-help-combat-malaria-in-Africa.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240608/Using-AI-to-revolutionize-mosquito-surveillance-to-help-combat-malaria-in-Africa.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2faa4248-45ea-45f3-a28b-ddd30a0a171d Sat, 08 Jun 2024 00:40:27 -0400 Using AI to revolutionize mosquito surveillance to help combat malaria in Africa
发现治疗乳腺癌脑转移的新生物学机制亚利桑那大学健康科学中心的研究人员领导的一项研究发现了一种生物机制，可以为转移至大脑的乳腺癌提供更有效的治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240607/New-biological-mechanism-uncovered-for-treating-breast-cancer-metastasis-to-the-brain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240607/New-biological-mechanism-uncovered-for-treating-breast-cancer-metastasis-to-the-brain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=625be516-9c21-4df2-9422-e85b55b87376 Fri, 07 Jun 2024 08:24:00 -0400 New biological mechanism uncovered for treating breast cancer metastasis to the brain
新型软机器人设备恢复自然食道运动以改善消化范德比尔特大学的一组研究人员开发了一种无线激活设备，可以模仿食道和小肠中负责运输食物和粘性液体进行消化的波状肌肉功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240607/New-soft-robotic-device-restores-natural-esophageal-motion-for-improved-digestion.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240607/New-soft-robotic-device-restores-natural-esophageal-motion-for-improved-digestion.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b635cb37-a5a7-461f-a4f3-631115d22644 Fri, 07 Jun 2024 08:16:00 -0400 New soft-robotic device restores natural esophageal motion for improved digestion
靶向树突状细胞中的表观遗传酶以改善癌症免疫治疗免疫疗法是对抗癌症的支柱之一，旨在使人体自身的免疫系统能够对抗肿瘤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240607/Targeting-epigenic-enzymes-in-dendritic-cells-to-improve-cancer-immunotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240607/Targeting-epigenic-enzymes-in-dendritic-cells-to-improve-cancer-immunotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=166664b3-4562-4741-9758-bebcc9e74876 Fri, 07 Jun 2024 08:04:09 -0400 Targeting epigenetic enzymes in dendritic cells to improve cancer immunotherapy
EULAR制定手骨关节炎新分类标准目前，手部骨关节炎（OA）的分类是基于临床表现，现有工具无法区分某些表型。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240607/EULAR-develops-new-classification-criteria-for-hand-osteoarthritis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240607/EULAR-develops-new-classification-criteria-for-hand-osteoarthritis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aaa38dab-784b-4b12-91c7-cc06ecb39ce1 Fri, 07 Jun 2024 07:53:37 -0400 EULAR develops new classification criteria for hand osteoarthritis
昆士兰大学研究人员寻求改善尘肺病诊断后人们重返工作岗位的途径昆士兰大学的研究处于寻找改善尘肺病患者重返工作岗位方法的前沿。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240607/UQ-researchers-seek-to-improve-the-pathway-for-people-returning-to-work-after-dust-lung-disease-diagnosis。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240607/UQ-researchers-seek-to-improve-the-pathway-for-people-returning-to-work-after-dust-lung-disease-diagnosis。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e3fc36ee-fa83-466e-980d-a2a915e7726c Fri, 07 Jun 2024 07:50:30 -0400 UQ researchers seek to improve the pathway for people returning to work after dust lung disease diagnosis
厌恶学习的机制：负面经历如何塑造神经回路当面对负面反馈、不利影响或令人失望的结果时，我们经常说“我不会再这样做了”。因此，我们试图从这些负面经历中吸取教训。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240607/Brain-Circuits-Underlying-Learning-From-Negative-Experiences.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240607/Brain-Circuits-Underlying-Learning-From-Negative-Experiences.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5c3750c9-7a7a-4de5-9b3c-7ad1da95886f Fri, 07 Jun 2024 07:24:00 -0400 Mechanisms of aversive learning: How negative experiences shape neural circuits

研究发现服务犬可以减少退伍军人的创伤后应激障碍、焦虑和抑郁退伍军人中精神科服务犬伙伴关系与创伤后应激障碍（PTSD）之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240607/Study-finds-service-dogs-reduce-PTSD-anxiety-and-depression-in-veterans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240607/Study-finds-service-dogs-reduce-PTSD-anxiety-and-depression-in-veterans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a9621d6c-212e-4183-8cd0-7076a676db64 Fri, 07 Jun 2024 06:38:00 -0400 Study finds service dogs reduce PTSD, anxiety, and depression in veterans
